level.heading: Grounds.
level.text: The Mayor may commence a proceeding under ยง 29-106.02 to dissolve a domestic filing entity administratively if the entity does not:
Pay any fee, tax, or penalty required to be paid to the Mayor not later than 5 months after it is due;
Deliver a biennial report to the Mayor not later than 6 months after it is due; or
Have a registered agent in the District for 60 days.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.
